item.title: Overhanging tree, 27th August
item.description:
This is overhanging a pavement to a height that has to be avoided This needs to be trimmed back by resident This has got progressively worse over the years It is difficult to pass when tall especially with buggy
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Saint Michaels Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
